text: Selena Gomez ’ s mother, Mandy Teefey, was asked about her daughter ’ s rekindled romance with Justin Bieber, and she did not hold back. Speaking with Gossip Cop, Teefey, 41, admitted that she is “ not happy ” that her daughter, 25, and Bieber, 23, are back together, but acknowledged that “ Selena can live her life however she wants as long as she is happy, safe and healthy. ” Teefey also addressed her daughter ’ s recent kidney transplant, with the singer ’ s longtime friend Francia Raisa donating her kidney.
